message: You're starting too high, I'll give you a lower offer this time!
Compromise, Bob! I'll give you a bit less.
You're still too high, Alice. I'm not budging yet!
Last chance, Bob! Meet me in the middle again!
You're getting desperate, Alice. I'm not backing down!
Getting desperate, Bob! Take it or leave it!
I'm not giving in yet, Alice. You're going to have to do better than that!
This is my final offer, Bob. Take it or walk away!
You're really pushing your luck, Alice. I'm not going to let you have all the cake!
This is my last stand, Bob. Take it or we both lose!
It's now or never, Alice. Take it or we both walk away with nothing!
